name: tm05
effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Roar to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen I: Mega Kick)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is scared off, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is scared off, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is scared off, to be replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.
